statements.select:
Select cusid, cuscn, cusname, cusenglishname, custel, cusfax, cusemail, cuswebsite, cusaddress, cusareaid, cuskindid, cusoperatorid, cusdepartmentid, cussourceid, cusaddoperatorid, cusadddate, cusmodifyoperatorid, cusmodifydate, cusintroduction, cusremark, cuscertificationtype, cuscertificationno, cuscontactor, cusexttype1, cusexttype2, cusexttype3, cusexttext1, cusexttext2, cusexttext3, cuslongtitude, cuslatitude, cuslastfollowdate, cusexpireddate, cusprotectdaysleft, cuslastorderdate, cusstatusid From [Customer]
cusid=#cusID#
statements.statement: declare @primarykeyid int execute @primarykeyid = usp_GetID 'Customer' Insert Into [Customer] ( cusid, cuscn, cusname, cusenglishname, custel, cusfax, cusemail, cuswebsite, cusaddress, cusareaid, cuskindid, cusoperatorid, cusdepartmentid, cussourceid, cusaddoperatorid, cusadddate, cusmodifyoperatorid, cusmodifydate, cusintroduction, cusremark, cuscertificationtype, cuscertificationno, cuscontactor, cusexttype1, cusexttype2, cusexttype3, cusexttext1, cusexttext2, cusexttext3, cuslongtitude, cuslatitude, cuslastfollowdate, cusexpireddate, cusprotectdaysleft, cuslastorderdate, cusstatusid )Values( @primarykeyid , #cusCN#, #cusName#, #cusEnglishName#, #cusTel#, #cusFax#, #cusEmail#, #cusWebsite#, #cusAddress#, #cusAreaID#, #cusKindID#, #cusOperatorID#, #cusDepartmentID#, #cusSourceID#, #cusAddOperatorID#, #cusAddDate#, #cusModifyOperatorID#, #cusModifyDate#, #cusIntroduction#, #cusRemark#, #cusCertificationType#, #cusCertificationNO#, #cusContactor#, #cusExtType1#, #cusExtType2#, #cusExtType3#, #cusExtText1#, #cusExtText2#, #cusExtText3#, #cusLongtitude#, #cusLatitude#, #cusLastFollowDate#, #cusExpiredDate#, #cusProtectDaysLeft#, #cusLastOrderDate#, #cusStatusID# ) Select @primarykeyid
statements.update:
Update [Customer] Set cusid=#cusID#, cuscn=#cusCN#, cusname=#cusName#, cusenglishname=#cusEnglishName#, custel=#cusTel#, cusfax=#cusFax#, cusemail=#cusEmail#, cuswebsite=#cusWebsite#, cusaddress=#cusAddress#, cusareaid=#cusAreaID#, cuskindid=#cusKindID#, cusoperatorid=#cusOperatorID#, cusdepartmentid=#cusDepartmentID#, cussourceid=#cusSourceID#, cusaddoperatorid=#cusAddOperatorID#, cusadddate=#cusAddDate#, cusmodifyoperatorid=#cusModifyOperatorID#, cusmodifydate=#cusModifyDate#, cusintroduction=#cusIntroduction#, cusremark=#cusRemark#, cuscertificationtype=#cusCertificationType#, cuscertificationno=#cusCertificationNO#, cuscontactor=#cusContactor#, cusexttype1=#cusExtType1#, cusexttype2=#cusExtType2#, cusexttype3=#cusExtType3#, cusexttext1=#cusExtText1#, cusexttext2=#cusExtText2#, cusexttext3=#cusExtText3#, cuslongtitude=#cusLongtitude#, cuslatitude=#cusLatitude#, cuslastfollowdate=#cusLastFollowDate#, cusexpireddate=#cusExpiredDate#, cusprotectdaysleft=#cusProtectDaysLeft#, cuslastorderdate=#cusLastOrderDate#, cusstatusid=#cusStatusID#
cusid=#cusID#
